text: You have completed your registration for {bundle_name}, please check your schedlue for course times. For additional information, please call {company_number} or email {company_email}

email.subject: New bundle registration
email.body:
Hey {name},

You have completed your registration for {bundle_name}, please check your schedlue for course times. For additional information, please call {company_phone} or email {company_email}

Respectfully,

{company_name}

P: {company_phone}
